title: Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate X86 Multi-11 Pre-Activated Oct 2014
description:
Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate x86 Multi-11 Pre-Activated Oct 2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  * This release contains one ISO [SOURCE ISO] and ten exe-files.
  * All exe-files are created from original MSDN ISO's for each language.
  * This is done with SmartVersion, a program that calculates only the 
    difference between two files (one of which is used as the source) 
    and then creates an exe-file based on that difference.

  * Hashes attached in a separate .txt 


[ DOWNLOAD INFO ]

  * Download the Source ISO and preferred language.exe
  * If you want en-US then just download the SOURCE ISO
 
  * Run the exe-file in the same folder as the SOURCE ISO.
    This will extract & recreate the original ISO, fully updated and
    in the selected language.


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 7 Home Premium 	         
  * Windows 7 Professional		
  * Windows 7 Ultimate


[ LANGUAGES & SOURCES ]

  * da-DK  [Danish]  	  X17-59891
  * de-DE  [German]	  X17-59886
  * en-US  [English]      X17-59463
  * es-ES  [Spanish]	  X17-58877
  * fi-FI  [Finnish] 	  X17-59192
  * fr-FR  [French]	  X17-59477
  * it-IT  [Italian]	  X17-59212
  * nb-NO  [Norwegian]	  X17-59229
  * nl-NL  [Dutch]	  X17-59233
  * pt-PT  [Portuguese]	  X17-59246
  * sv-SE  [Swedish]	  X17-59271


[SOURCE ISO]

  * Win7.x86.en-US.iso  Size: 3,42GB

[ EXE-FILES ]			
 
  * Win7.x86.da-DK.exe	Size:  386MB

  * Win7.x86.de-DE.exe	Size:  439MB

  * Win7.x86.es-ES.exe	Size:  424MB

  * Win7.x86.fi-FI.exe	Size:  369MB

  * Win7.x86.fr-FR.exe	Size:  420MB

  * Win7.x86.it-IT.exe	Size:  364MB

  * Win7.x86.nb-NO.exe	Size:  410MB

  * Win7.x86.nl-NL.exe	Size:  370MB

  * Win7.x86.pt-PT.exe	Size:  362MB

  * Win7.x86.sv-SE.exe	Size:  398MB
 

[ CONTENTS ]

  * USB3, Sata and Network drivers added.


  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

  * IE 11
  * .NET Framework 4.5.2
  * Hotfixes - 2014-10-14


   Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 7 (Microsoft DaRT)
    

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]


  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "Windows Loader" and "Begin Install".
  * To skip activation, just click on "Exit".   
  
  Activator:

  * Daz Loader v2.2.2.0 

    
[ INSTALLATION ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or, if you really must; burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
